HiddenText.Name: How much preparation is required before each meeting with my assigned Pathway student?
HiddenText.OpenningText: How much preparation is required before each meeting with my assigned Pathway student?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: You do not need to prepare material or discussion topics. The students have an assignment for each visit with discussion questions and language practice activities related to the course topics that they are studying during the corresponding week. The students are expected to come prepared and to lead the discussions. You will see each assignment on the website and you should review the topics and activities prior to each session to anticipate questions.
